âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ Adds a default table flip ASCII art prefix to error messages. â€¢ Allows customization of the error message prefix. â€¢ Provides methods to enable and disable the error flipping functionality. â€¢ Works with both standard `Error` objects and `console.error` calls.
ðŸ“– Summary: Flip On Fail is a JavaScript package that enhances error messages by adding fun, expressive prefixes, such as the table flip ASCII art. It can be installed via npm or yarn and used in both browser and Node.js environments to make debugging more entertaining.
